title: Help!
body: So I'm going to North-Eastern China for a few weeks to visit my relatives. However, from past experience, league did not work the last time I visited. Will NA servers work in China without VPN? Someone please reply, I wish to buy the new PROJECT: Hextech chests!!

replies.body:
Playing on the NA servers from China can be pretty difficult. Between the physical distance your connection has to travel and the network restrictions inside of China, there's a lot that could be problematic. If you're finding that using a VPN is the only way you're able to connect, then you may simply have too many restrictions on your network to connect normally. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Yes. I have a question. Will I be able to connect to the client (as I asked in my original post...)?

Because I don't know the exact network configurations you'll be using or the specific network restrictions in the area, I cannot say with certainty if you will be able to connect or not. If you require assistance with your connection after arriving in China, your best course of action is to reach out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

With your ticket, you can attach both a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and the URL to a completed [Network Analysis.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1) This will expedite your service with our techs.
